1.title: Giant Chief/Shrink a Dink

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

1.plot: It's Tak's birthday, and Jibolba gives him the mysterious gift of a... rock. However, Tak soon realizes that this is no ordinary rock. It's a magical crystal that transports him into the Juju Bizaar for the very for the first time

2.title: Sheep Dip/Slog the Babysitter

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

2.plot: It's time for the Pupununu's Annual Foot Dance Contest, and Tak is shocked when Jeera tells him that she is going with Keeko! Tak is horrified when Jibolba takes a trip and forces to him to have... a babysitter!

3.title: Nice Calves/Double Tak

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

3.plot: It's Wiblet Season again and Tak is determined to catch the impossibly fast Wiblet for the Chief to feast on.When the Pupununus keep thanking Tak for things he doesn't remember doing, he begins to think he's going crazy.

4.title: Feathers/Sans Sheriff

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

4.plot: When the Chief demands that Lok retrieve the beautiful feather of the ferocious Pangtiddler bird for him, Tak is sent along to assist Lok on the dangerous quest. The pesky Devour Brothers are harassing all the Juju's.

6.title: Ball Boy/The Lost Boys

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Break This/Pack of Apes

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

8.plot: Performing a crazy stuny, Jeera breaks every bone in her body. Stuck in a body cast, Jeera begs Tak to fix her. When Tak helps Chief improve his chin-jo playing w/ magic, it results in the Chief captured by music loving apes

12.title: New Pet/Tak's Monster

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

12.plot: Tak and Jeera find an irresistibly cute, three-horned creature that can turn invisible, levitate, play music from his horns, and more. Tak is having nightmares of a scary monster and they are driving him crazy.

1.title: Woodiefest/Loser

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

1.plot: The ferocious Woodie creatures are planning to trash the Pupununu village during their annual rampage through the jungle.Tired of Lok bragging about his heroic feats, Tak decides to test him with an impossible task.

2.title: A Shaman's Shaman/The Gift

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

2.plot: Tak's magic has been going haywire lately, and it seems like Jibolba may be to blame.It's Jibolba's Shamanic Anniversary, and Tak's forgotten to get him a present - again! Luckily, he finds a gift in the juju marketplace... a magical Motiki doll!

3.title: The Three Chiefs/The Party

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

3.plot: When some important visitors take a liking to Tak, both he and the Chief get caught up in the flattering attention. To celebrate the tribe's recent good luck, Tak decides to throw a bash!

4.title: The Beast/To Zaria with Love

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

4.plot: A gross, disgusting Juju has been kicked out of his realm for not fitting in. Feeling sorry for the guy, Tak gives him a makeover!Tak is horrified when Psychic Juju tells Tak, he will marry Zaria!

5.title: Zaria's in Charge/Bad Luck's Back

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

5.plot: The Chief heads off on a trip, leaving Zaria in control of the tribe. Unfortunately, Zaria turns out to be a tyrant!When more bad luck plagues the tribe, scheming Blod and Bleeta convince the villagers that Tak is to blame!

6.title: This Bites/Chief?

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

6.plot: Though it's against the rules, Tak uses magic to remove his aching tooth, and the magic brings his tooth to life.Chief's been acting very strange lately - and Jeera's worried he's gone crazy!

7.title: Big Boss Brawl/Our Favorite Juju

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

7.plot: According to a long-forgotten Juju tradition, the Pupununu Chief must battle a mighty creature in the Juju realm - the undefeated Big Boss - or risk world annihilation!The Pupununu have been plagued by pestering Zing Flies!

8.title: Love Hurts/Frien-e-mies

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

8.plot: After Jeera jokes about how she could never fall in love with Tak, he decides to prove otherwise.Jeera's frustrated because Tak's been busy protecting Bleeta's home from animal attacks to hang out with her.

9.title: The Littlest Gratch/Lok, the Offender

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

9.plot: The tribe's supply of roast gratch is dwindling. And Tak and Jeera don't want their new pet to be next on the Pupununu menu.A terrible, three-headed monster called the Drykopf shows up in the village.

10.title: Joy Ride/Step Juju

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

10.plot: When a Juju gives Jeera with her own J-Runner (a Juju version of a car), Tak gets jealous.ibolba returns from vacation with a surprise - he's gotten married!

11.title: Boom! Bang! Boom!/Great Juju Impersonator

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

11.plot: The Jujus have gone on vacation for one thousand years, and if Tak tells the tribe, they're sure to freak out!Out of nowhere, the Pupununu suddenly begin exploding! One by one, they poof into sparkles, never to be seen again

12.title: Little Chief/Pugnacious No More

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

12.plot: Chief's getting sick of his responsibilities, asking Tak to make him young again to avoid work.After summoning Pugnacious Juju for some "fight training," Tak accidentally punches the Juju and absorbs his powers.

13.title: Girls Only/Secession

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

13.plot: Jeera's been ditching Tak to attend a secret girls-only gathering in a hidden cave, and Tak is desperate to find out what's going on in there. Tak, Jeera and Keeko are tired of adults always telling them what to do...

14.title: Tikis of War/Hairy Zaria

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

14.plot: The vicious Motikis have captured the Pupununu and taken over the tribe! However, Tak and a few lucky ones have escaped.When a prank-gone-wrong turns Zaria into a creepy creature, Tak and Jeera try to turn her back.

15.title: Mofather/Big Love

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

15.plot: Keeko's never had a family, so when he finds a special connection with a jungle bird, he assumes it's his mother and father.Lok asks Tak to get the love-struck Slog off his back, and Tak obliges--a little too well.

16.title: Ball of Wax

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

16.plot: Chief's been hiding his enormous earwax ball from everyone. And when Tak and Jeera discover the nasty thing, they know they have to get rid of it.

17.title: Beautiful Girls/Bad Medicine

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

17.plot: After an argument over who is prettier, Love Juju and Zaria decide to compete against each other in their own beauty pageant, with Tak as the judge!

19.title: Destiny Schmestiny

episode of.title: Tak & the Power of Juju (TV Series 2007–2009)

19.plot: It's Tak's birthday, and Jibolba gives him the mysterious gift of a... rock. However, Tak soon realizes that this is no ordinary rock. It's a magical crystal that transports him into the Juju Bizaar for the very for the first time

imdb.plot outline: Tak is given a staff, the "Power of Juju", and instead of using it responsibly, he's often than not using it to make his workload from Jibolba easier or to solve a problem. He hangs out with his friends, avoids doing chores, takes any glory he can get, and learns his lessons the hard way. Despite it all, his intentions are usually pure. He's branded as a fool, a coward, and a cursed boy despite his heroic efforts when he's helping his fellow tribespeople, especially from Lok and Chief. Jeera, his best friend, does the same at times, but she's just as wild as Tak is.
imdb.title: Tak & the Power of Juju
akas: Tak & the Power of Juju (United States)
plot: The show follows the title character named Tak who must protect the Pupununu people from Tlaloc's evil spell.::rocknrollunderdawg

Tak is given a staff, the "Power of Juju", and instead of using it responsibly, he's often than not using it to make his workload from Jibolba easier or to solve a problem. He hangs out with his friends, avoids doing chores, takes any glory he can get, and learns his lessons the hard way. Despite it all, his intentions are usually pure. He's branded as a fool, a coward, and a cursed boy despite his heroic efforts when he's helping his fellow tribespeople, especially from Lok and Chief. Jeera, his best friend, does the same at times, but she's just as wild as Tak is.
